definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: The cost of seeds per mu could save 500 yuan and the total cost be half.
sentences.chinese: 每畝可節約種子費500多元，工本費可節省一半。

sentences.english: The omission of heat straightening may save energy and thus reduces production cost.
sentences.chinese: 特別是取消熱調直可節約能源，從而降低生產成本。

sentences.english: The indirect fume temperature regulator can save energy consumption and water consumption and solve the problem of gas leakage.
sentences.chinese: 本發明能節約能耗，水耗，並能避免煤氣泄漏的問題。

sentences.english: Great way to stretch a bottle of dish liquid.
sentences.chinese: 這可是一種節約洗滌液的好辦法啊。

sentences.english: Joint venture must implement the principle of economizing on land in their use of sites.
sentences.chinese: 合營企業使用場地，必須貫徹執行節約用地原則。

sentences.english: Save for the pollution control priority.
Co-payments should be raised to make patients and their physicians more cost-conscious.
sentences.chinese: 自付額應該提高，使病人和醫生更加註重節約成本。

sentences.english: It is impossible to construct a resource-saving society without the formation of national notion of saving.
sentences.chinese: 建設資源節約型社會與全民節約觀念的形成密不可分。

sentences.english: It is impossible to construct a resource-saving society without the formation of national notion of saving.
sentences.chinese: 建設資源節約型社會與全民節約觀念的形成密不可分。

sentences.english: Economize on energy and resources to develop a cyclic economy.
sentences.chinese: 節約各類能源和資源，努力發展循環經濟。

sentences.english: But cities with water shortages aren't the only places looking to conserve water, Fishman says.
sentences.chinese: 菲什曼說，並非只有缺水的城市在想辦法節約用水。

sentences.english: Thus, it is necessary for everyone to economize on water resources.
sentences.chinese: 因而節約水資源對每個人來說都勢在必行。

sentences.english: The principle of diligence and frugality applies to all undertakings.
sentences.chinese: 勤儉節約的原則適用於一切事業。

sentences.english: Their incarceration adds costs far greater than the alleged savings in the court system.
sentences.chinese: 監禁他們的費用遠比法院系統節約的費用要高得多。

sentences.english: Conservation-oriented landscape is an important part of the society.
sentences.chinese: 節約型園林綠化是建設節約型社會的重要內容。

sentences.english: Conservation-oriented landscape is an important part of the society.
sentences.chinese: 節約型園林綠化是建設節約型社會的重要內容。

definition: saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
many and complicated/mired in minor details
to furnish/to provide/supply (as in supply and demand)
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
